qas.question: What type of construction is often used now to build homes in much of the world?

Along with decorative components, what type of building materials can be engineered from wood?
What industry benefits greatly from engineered wood products?

context: New domestic housing in many parts of the world today is commonly made from <a0_0>timber-framed<a0_0/> construction. Engineered wood products are becoming a bigger part of the <a3_0>construction<a3_0/> industry. They may be used in both residential and <a1_0>commercial<a1_0/> buildings as <a2_0>structural<a2_0/> and aesthetic materials.
